caption.p: Hematology and serum biochemistry findings for NHPs after EBOV challenge at 3 dpi. NHPs were given equine F(ab′) 2 starting at 3 dpi. (A) WBC counts. (B) LYM counts. (C) LYM percentages. (D) MON percentages. (E) NEU percentages. (F) PLT counts. (G) ALT levels. (H) ALP levels. (I) AMY levels. (J) TBIL levels. (K) BUN levels. (L) GLU levels.
